summary:
### **Monthly Operating Report – Key Material Information**  

#### **Operational & Financial Highlights**  
- **Customer Business**:  
  - Mass market electricity & gas sales: **365GWh** (↓11.6% YoY vs. May 2024: 413GWh).  
  - Mass market netback: **$145.13/MWh** (↑11.3% YoY vs. $130.41/MWh).  

- **Wholesale Business**:  
  - Contracted electricity sales: **768GWh** (↓1.3% YoY vs. 778GWh).  
  - Electricity & steam net revenue: **$169.49/MWh** (↑3.8% YoY vs. $163.31/MWh).  
  - Unit generation cost (incl. acquired): **$49.26/MWh** (↓20.3% YoY vs. $61.80/MWh).  
  - Own generation cost: **$42.3/MWh** (↓13.8% YoY vs. $49.1/MWh).  

- **Project Updates**:  
  - **Te Huka 3**: **99.7%** complete (vs. target 100%).  
  - **Battery Storage (BESS)**: **70%** complete (vs. target 79%).  

- **Commodity Prices & Storage**:  
  - **Otahuhu futures (Q3 2025)**: **$182.25/MWh** (↓8.4% MoM from $199/MWh on 30 May).  
  - **Hydro Storage**:  
    - **South Island**: 87% of mean.  
    - **North Island**: 139% of mean.  
  - **12-month contracted gas volume**: **3.8PJ** (vs. revised April figure of 5.5PJ).  

- **Market Demand**:  
  - NZ electricity demand ↓6% YoY (May 2024 was unusually cold). Flat vs. May 2023.  

#### **Key Metrics (May 2025 vs. May 2024)**  
| Metric                     | May 2025  | May 2024  | Change |  
|----------------------------|----------|----------|--------|  
| Mass market sales (GWh)     | 365      | 413      | ↓11.6% |  
| Wholesale contracted (GWh)  | 768      | 778      | ↓1.3%  |  
| Unit generation cost ($/MWh)| 49.26    | 61.80    | ↓20.3% |  
| Netback ($/MWh)             | 145.13   | 130.41   | ↑11.3% |  

### **Conclusion**  
- **Lower sales volumes** offset by **higher netback margins** and **reduced generation costs**.  
- **Commodity price decline** (Otahuhu futures) may pressure forward revenue.  
- **Hydro storage strong in North Island**, moderate in South Island.  
- **BESS project slightly behind schedule** (70% vs. 79% target).  

No capital markets or liquidity-impacting announcements detected.
